info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 7 at 6:40AM EDT until June 7 at 9:45AM EDT by NWS Jackson KY
info.description:
FFWJKL
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... Southwestern Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... Northwestern Knott County in southeastern Kentucky... North Central Leslie County in southeastern Kentucky... Eastern Owsley County in southeastern Kentucky... Northern Perry County in southeastern Kentucky...
* Until 945 AM EDT.
* At 640 AM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 1.5 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Hazard, Hindman, Pippa Passes, Buckhorn, Dice, Bulan, Ary, Rowdy, Fisty, Talcum, Cordia, Lamont, Ritchie, Emmalena, Avawam, Bearville, Krypton, Elic, Chavies and Carrie.
This includes the following streams and drainages... Left Fork Troublesome Creek, Big Creek, Sixteenmile Creek, Troublesome Creek, Caney Fork, Bush Branch, Jake Branch, Smith Branch, Pigeonroost Branch, Grapevine Creek, Williams Fork, Buckhorn Creek, Hollybush Creek, MacIntosh Creek, Spencer Creek, Lotts Creek, North Fork Kentucky River, Carr Fork, Quicksand Creek, Mill Branch, Left Fork Holly Bush Creek, Nealy Branch, Ogden Branch, Coles Fork, Left Fork Upper Second Creek, Tenmile Creek, Alum Cave Branch, Right Fork Beaver Creek, Right Fork Buffalo Creek, Trace Branch, Balls Fork, Branhams Branch, Ball Branch, Morris Fork, Lucky Fork, Right Fork Big Branch, Right Fork Leatherwood Creek, Kay Fork, Terry Branch, Right Fork Big Creek, Clear Creek, Beech Creek, Browns Fork, Montgomery Creek, Left Fork Elkhorn Creek, Youngs Fork, Middle Fork Kentucky River, Sam Campbell Branch, Buffalo Creek, Lost Creek, Stable Fork, Laurel Fork, Big Branch, Beatty Fork, Hurricane Branch, Big Willard Creek, Patten Fork, Long Fork, Mill Creek, Rowdy Branch, Hell For Certain Creek, Little Willard Creek, Lick Branch and Leatherwood Creek.
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Breathitt, KY; Knott, KY; Leslie, KY; Owsley, KY; Perry, KY
